Player History
Injured on 8/14/1969 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/22/1970 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1976...
Traded from New York (N) to Texas on 2/20/1976 (Going to NYM: 2B K. Seibert. Going to TEX: 2B G. Hubbard)...
Injured on 8/28/1976 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Injured on 5/19/1979 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/24/1980, off Antonio Pollorena (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/9/1980, off Jim Slaton (CHW)...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/15/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $1,386,000 per year...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 1/31/1990 (Going to TEX: 2B G. Hubbard. Going to CLE: P E. Vande Berg, C J. Orton)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 3/1/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Injured on 7/14/1993 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
